statements: SELECT * FROM roles_permissions;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_type = 'student';
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_type FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_type = 'instructor' ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_type FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_id > 1 ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_type = 'instructor';
SELECT * FROM roles_permissions ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_type <> 'administrator';
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_type FROM roles_permissions WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY role_type ASC;
SELECT MAX(role_id) AS max_role_id, MIN(role_id) AS min_role_id FROM roles_permissions;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE role = 'Professor';
SELECT id, name FROM students WHERE department = 'Computer Science' AND year = 3;
SELECT name, role FROM instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE year > 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM students WHERE year <= 2;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE role='Professor' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM instructors WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, department FROM students WHERE year=3 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, department FROM students WHERE year=1 AND department='Computer Science';
SELECT id, name, role FROM instructors WHERE name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT name, role FROM instructors WHERE role = 'Professor';
SELECT student_id, name FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT admin_id, name, access_level FROM administrators WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY admin_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE role = 'Professor';
SELECT name FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT admin_id, name FROM administrators WHERE access_level = 'Admin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_id ASC;
SELECT name, grade FROM students WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B', 'C') ORDER BY grade DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM instructors
SELECT name, role FROM students WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, name, role FROM administrators ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, permission FROM permissions WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE role = 'Professor'
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, role FROM administrators WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT name, role FROM administrators WHERE role LIKE '%min%';
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM Administrators ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT name, role FROM Students WHERE role = 'Undergraduate' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE role = 'Undergraduate';
SELECT course_name, name FROM Courses JOIN Instructors ON Courses.instructor_id = Instructors.instructor_id;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Enrollments JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_id, name FROM Instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
